gitlens.ai.generateCommitMessage.customI: Generate a commit message using the Conventional Commits format. Examples: ['feat: Add new feature to the project', 'fix: Fix a bug in the project', 'chore: Update build configuration or task', 'docs: Update project documentation', 'style: Update code formatting or style', 'refactor: Refactor existing code', 'test: Add or update tests', 'perf: Improve performance of the project', 'ci: Update continuous integration configuration', 'build: Make changes related to the build process', 'revert: Revert a previous commit']
